feed.title: One on One
feed.subtitle: One on One, hosted by Jack Acello and Noah Schwartz, is an all-encompassing basketball podcast, specifically focused on the NBA. Jack and Noah, long-time college roommates, spend much of their free time watching, analyzing, and debating the NBA, and now they get to bring those conversations to the airwaves! Be sure to tune in weekly for some of the best basketball content available!

author.name: High Tops Media & Jack Acello, Noah Schwartz

entry.title: Luka Returns to Dallas, Malone out of Denver, and Award Predictions - Season 4 Episode 10”

link.title: Luka Returns to Dallas, Malone out of Denver, and Award Predictions - Season 4 Episode 10”

entry.content:
Jack and Noah are back! This episode they discuss Luka Doncic returning to Dallas since being traded to LA. The guys also discuss the shocking firing of Nuggets Head Coach Mike Malone. Lastly they give all NBA and award predictions as the playoffs near.

Be sure to tune in to all One on One content and take a look at the show’s social media channels for more activity than ever before. Follow the pod on Twitter (@1on1podHTM), IG (@1on1pod), and on the brand new TikTok (@1on1bballpod) where there will be an increased presence on all of these accounts!

https://www.instagram.com/1on1pod/
https://twitter.com/1on1podHTM/
https://www.tiktok.com/@1on1bballpod/

A High Tops Media Podcast You can follow for more High Tops Media content on Facebook, Instagram, and Twitter: @hightopsmedia
And to find more podcasts with High Tops Sports, check out @hightopssports on Instagram
Check out more podcasts on our website https://hightops.media

entry.title: Kyrie Hurt and a Mavs Apocalypse, Lakers/Celtics Rivalry, LBJ and Brunson Out, Jokic Goes 30/20/20 - Season 4 Episode 9”

link.title: Kyrie Hurt and a Mavs Apocalypse, Lakers/Celtics Rivalry, LBJ and Brunson Out, Jokic Goes 30/20/20 - Season 4 Episode 9”

entry.content:
This week, the guys are back to discuss how the Mavericks are staring at a disaster with long-term ramifications. Kyrie and AD are hurt, have contractual decisions approaching, and Luka is not around to save the day. They also talk about Lakers/Celtics from the weekend, and the recent injuries to LeBron and Jalen Brunson. They finish the show debating OKC/Denver, and Jokic’s historic 30/20/20 game.

Be sure to tune in to all One on One content and take a look at the show’s social media channels for more activity than ever before. Follow the pod on Twitter (@1on1podHTM), IG (@1on1pod), and on the brand new TikTok (@1on1bballpod) where there will be an increased presence on all of these accounts!

https://www.instagram.com/1on1pod/
https://twitter.com/1on1podHTM/

entry.title: All-Star Review, Bobby Portis and Victor Wembanyama Updates, Luka Donic Early Lakers Tenure, and the Two Biggest Storylines Remaining This Season - Season 4 Episode 8”

link.title: All-Star Review, Bobby Portis and Victor Wembanyama Updates, Luka Donic Early Lakers Tenure, and the Two Biggest Storylines Remaining This Season - Season 4 Episode 8”

entry.content:
This week, the guys are back to discuss the recent All-Star weekend. The guys also give updates on players that will be out with suspension and injury plus they look at how Luka has played since joining LA. Lastly they end with their two biggest storylines to watch for the rest of the year.

Be sure to tune in to all One on One content and take a look at the show’s social media channels for more activity than ever before. Follow the pod on Twitter (@1on1podHTM), IG (@1on1pod), and on the brand new TikTok (@1on1bballpod) where there will be an increased presence on all of these accounts!

entry.title: NBA All-Star Rosters Revealed, Jimmy and Fox Trade Talks, Trades We Want to See Before the Deadline, 10 Minute Quarters Are a Bad Idea - Season 4 Episode 7”

link.title: NBA All-Star Rosters Revealed, Jimmy and Fox Trade Talks, Trades We Want to See Before the Deadline, 10 Minute Quarters Are a Bad Idea - Season 4 Episode 7”

entry.content:
This week, the guys are back to discuss the all-star rosters that were fully released and who was snubbed from a spot on the team. Then, they deep dive into Jimmy Butler and De’Aaron Fox situations as the two hottest names on the trade market. And with the deadline quickly approaching next week, Jack and Noah give their favorite player and team fits for the stretch run. They close the show by ripping Adam Silver’s new idea of 10 minute quarters in the NBA.

Be sure to tune in to all One on One content and take a look at the show’s social media channels for more activity than ever before. Follow the pod on Twitter (@1on1podHTM), IG (@1on1pod), and on the brand new TikTok (@1on1bballpod) where there will be an increased presence on all of these accounts!

entry.title: Jimmy Butler’s Trade Saga, Contenders/Pretenders/Midseason Award Leaders, and All-Star Picks - Season 4 Episode 6”

link.title: Jimmy Butler’s Trade Saga, Contenders/Pretenders/Midseason Award Leaders, and All-Star Picks - Season 4 Episode 6”

entry.content:
The guys start the new year with a deep dive into Jimmy Butler’s suspension and trade request, and discuss how his tenuous situation plays out with Miami. Noah and Jack then break down their contenders and pretenders in the league. They wrap the show by making their midseason choices for award winners and all-stars.

Be sure to tune in to all One on One content and take a look at the show’s social media channels for more activity than ever before. Follow the pod on Twitter (@1on1podHTM), IG (@1on1pod), and on the brand new TikTok (@1on1bballpod) where there will be an increased presence on all of these accounts!

entry.title: Kings Fire Mike Brown, Fox’s Future, Christmas Recap, How to Improve NBA Ratings With Lucas Jafet - Season 4 Episode 5”

link.title: Kings Fire Mike Brown, Fox’s Future, Christmas Recap, How to Improve NBA Ratings With Lucas Jafet - Season 4 Episode 5”

entry.content:
Noah and Jack are joined by Lucas Jafet of Share the Rock to close 2024. They discuss the issues in Sacramento with the recent firing of Mike Brown and De’Aaron Fox’s uncertain contract situation. They guys also break the very exciting Christmas Day slate of games. They close the show with a detailed conversation on why the NBA ratings have dipped to start the year, and what can be done to help remedy the situation going forward.

Be sure to tune in to all One on One content and take a look at the show’s social media channels for more activity than ever before. Follow the pod on Twitter (@1on1podHTM), IG (@1on1pod), and on the brand new TikTok (@1on1bballpod) where there will be an increased presence on all of these accounts!

entry.title: Philly in Trouble, NY and Minny Outlooks, Overachiever/Underachiever Draft - Season 4 Episode 4”

link.title: Philly in Trouble, NY and Minny Outlooks, Overachiever/Underachiever Draft - Season 4 Episode 4”

entry.content:
This week, the guys discuss the 76ers injuries and issues and the early returns of the Knicks/TWolves trade. They also draft some of the most overachieving and underachieving players in the early season.

entry.title: Cavs Remain Undefeated, What’s Wrong With the Eastern Conference, and Injuries Becoming Major Concern - Season 4 Episode 3”

link.title: Cavs Remain Undefeated, What’s Wrong With the Eastern Conference, and Injuries Becoming Major Concern - Season 4 Episode 3”

entry.content:
Jack and Noah are back and they discuss all the injuries that have happened so far this season. The guys also the Cleveland Cavaliers incredible start to the season and if they are legit contenders. Lastly they discuss the struggling Eastern Conference and what teams like the Bucks and Sixers can do to get back on track.

Be sure to tune in to all One on One content and take a look at the show’s social media channels for more activity than ever before.
